'''The Beacons''' is a [[:Category:Fan films|Fan Film]] produced by a group of French Lord of the Rings enthusiasts. They shot the short film in Auvergne, France in 2024<ref>[https://youtube.com/shorts/E4lGhYCAEd0?si=H-cEHHkpNx7GcO72 https://youtube.com/shorts/E4lGhYCAEd0]</ref> It was released on 2 October 2025

==Synopsis==
Borlas, a soldier of Gondor, is alerted: the beacons are lit. Danger lurks. After lighting his own, he realizes the next one does not ignite. The chain is broken. The kingdom is in peril.
